RT pbillingsby.eth Had to do one for @ArweaveTeam too. Thanks for helping me publish my first package @dhaiwat10! npm install react-arweave-image <ArweaveImage hash="<arweave image tx #>" /> You can also pass in any HTML image props like class names and event handlers to this component.

entry.title: RT JackForge.eth: Re @NFTsAreNice Definitely not wrong. 😅 Some of the best communities are probably for collections that aren't worth anything. @de...
entry.summary: RT JackForge.eth Re @NFTsAreNice Definitely not wrong. 😅 Some of the best communities are probably for collections that aren't worth anything. @developer_dao used NFTs for entry into the DAO. There is no speculative value to the NFTs, but the opportunities that come with being a member is massive.
